page.title: 10ARMED FORCES-RNAS CULDROSE
page.content: Culdrose is very important to the Helston area.It provides many jobs and gives custom to local shops. The Naval name is HMS Seahawk.A Seahawk plane stands near the main gates.2500 people work at Culdrose which is like a small town with its own shops,bank,leisure centre,fire station and even buses called "ferries".Culdrose is mainly involved with training.It has the RN Flying Training School for pilots and aircrew.The pilots usually have trained on fixed-wing aircraft before they do 80 hours training on helicopters.Also trained are aircraft handlers,observers,telephonists, firemen and meteorologists.A new large building is being completed for January 1986.It is a flying simulator for Sea King pilots.
